question: What is a key role of Business or Job in career astrology?
options:
Business - 7th
Job - 6th

Significator of Business - Mercury
Risk taking capacity, self confidence - strong lagna and lagnesh
Business ke liye - desire; kam trikone active
Desire planets - Mangal & Rahu
Look at Sun and Moon: both these planets have light; vision ke planet

question: What is a key role of Moon  Lagna in career astrology?
options:
Chandra se dasham mein baite hua grah, that grah is very important in your proffesion, like Amal Kirti

Until Moon/ janta does not acknowlege your profession, it is your hobby and not your profession
correct:
Chandra se dasham mein baite hua grah, that grah is very important in your proffesion, like Amal Kirti

Until Moon/ janta does not acknowlege your profession, it is your hobby and not your profession
explanation:
Chandra se dasham mein baite hua grah, that grah is very important in your proffesion, like Amal Kirti

Until Moon/ janta does not acknowlege your profession, it is your hobby and not your profession — From all three lagna, see the grah sitting in 10th house; If no grah see the lord of the 10th house, see in navamsha. 

1. If all the 3 lagna's indicate same planet, then person will have same proffession related to that planet.
2. Otherwise person changes profession

question:
What is a key role of Rule:
1. Look at 10th house from lagna (planet sitting and dashamesh) in navamsha
1. Look at 10th house from Chandra(planet sitting and dashamesh) in navamsha
1. Look at 10th house from Surya (planet sitting and dashamesh) in navamsha in career astrology?
options:
In Navamsha look at the rashi the planet is in to analyze career
e.g. If planet in Karka - the field will be maybe healing, counselling, janta; If Ju sitting here - consulting in these fields; If Sun or moon looking - govt related
If Rashi is Vrishb (2) - finance related

Note - Rashi in Navamsha is more important than the house - look at the rashi
correct:
In Navamsha look at the rashi the planet is in to analyze career
e.g. If planet in Karka - the field will be maybe healing, counselling, janta; If Ju sitting here - consulting in these fields; If Sun or moon looking - govt related
If Rashi is Vrishb (2) - finance related

Note - Rashi in Navamsha is more important than the house - look at the rashi
explanation:
In Navamsha look at the rashi the planet is in to analyze career
e.g. If planet in Karka - the field will be maybe healing, counselling, janta; If Ju sitting here - consulting in these fields; If Sun or moon looking - govt related
If Rashi is Vrishb (2) - finance related

Note - Rashi in Navamsha is more important than the house - look at the rashi
